attributes.action: Prevent driving tests and lessons from being cancelled/stopped
attributes.additional_details: We are wanting this as thousands if not hundreds of us have had our driving tests cancelled multiple times now due to the pandemic. This is not only a massive expense to keep doing but it pushes our learning back to a point where we have to spend more money re learning. Furthermore it creates anxiety for a lot of learners who have booked their tests during this time. THIS IS EDUCATIONAL.
attributes.background: We want the government to not cancel our driving tests/lessons for ALL learners during the covid pandemic/ second national lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
